name: The Horde (itch) (norbertc)
description:
In this game your task is to kill big horde of zombies. You have at your disposal many weapons. Also you can use elements of the environment to kill zombies. Take part in this fast fight, destroy horde and don't let zombies to kill you.

Level editor

You can make your own levels using level editor build in this game. You can use many tools to make the best level. In the future I want to add more toys to there are more possibilities to create.

Plans

I want to add to this game: 

  •  more types of enemys,
  •  more tools to create levels, 
  • more weapons,
  •  prospect to download levels creadted by other people,
  • fix all bugs and issues,
  • optymalization,
  • make this game better.

Please, give me feedback in comments.
